thread.title: Cherie Richardson
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Cherie Richardson

author: Cherie Richardson
title: Cherie Richardson
text: Amazing products and super speedy delivery! I was able to order 50p cheaper from country attire than directly from the supplier! I will be using this store in the future. Amazing service
